typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		email as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source
source derive(email = sha2(256, email)) ~> masking
masking sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'masking',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> target
